Cookie policy[Emma Burridge](https://haldoredu.com/author/emma-burridge/ "Posts by Emma Burridge")2023-05-24T09:37:54+02:00

This website uses cookies
=========================

We use cookies to personalise content and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.

### About cookies

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user’s experience more efficient.  
The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your permission.

This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages.

You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the [Revoke Cookies](https://haldoredu.com/cookie-policy/revoke-cookies/)\-page on our website.

Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process personal data in our [Privacy Policy](https://haldoredu.com/privacy-policy/).

Your consent applies to the following domains: www.haldoredu.com, www.haldor.se, support.haldor.se, marketplace.haldor.se

### Settings/preferences/functionality

These cookies enable Haldor’s websites to remember information that changes the way the websites behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

| Name | Provider | Purpose | Expiry | Type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| pll\_language | www.haldor.se | Remembers the user’s selected language version of a website. | 1 year | HTTP Cookie |
| cookie\_notice\_accepted | www.haldor.se | Remembers the user’s consent to store cookies for a website | 1 min/Session | HTTP Cookie |
| lang \[x2\] | linkedin.com  <br>ads.linkedin.com | Set by LinkedIn when a web page contains an embedded “Follow us” panel. | Session | HTTP Cookie |
| \_cf\_bm | .haldor.zendesk.com | This Cloudflare cookie helps manage incoming traffic that matches criteria associated with bots. | 30 minutes | HTTP Cookie |
| \_cfruid | .haldor.zendesk.com | Cloudflare cookie used in cases were multiple users are hidden behind the same client IP address. Each user will have a unique cookie to help prevent a case of rate limiting all users if one particular user hits the rate limit threshold. | Session | HTTP Cookie |
| \_cfduid | .haldor.zendesk.com | Cloudflare cookie used for security restrictions. | 30 days | HTTP Cookie |
| _\__help_\__center\_session | haldor.zendesk.com | Stores unique session key for Help Center product. | Session | HTTP Cookie |
| AppContext | marketplace.haldor.se | Used to identify your role as a user when logged in  (e.g. Seller admin, Customer, etc.) and identify user-related data when logged in. | 24 hours | HTTP Cookie |

### Statistics

Statistic cookies help websites owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

| Name | Provider | Purpose | Expiry | Type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| \_ga | .haldor.se | Used by Google Analytics to register a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website. | 2 years | HTTP Cookie |
| \_gat | .haldor.se | Used by Google Analytics to throttle request rate. | 1 min/Session | HTTP Cookie |
| \_gid | .haldor.se | Used by Google Analytics to register a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website. | 24 hours/Session | HTTP Cookie |
| ai\_session | www.haldor.se  <br>marketplace.haldor.se | Used by Microsoft Application Insights to register a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website. | 30 min/Session | HTTP Cookie |
| ai\_user | www.haldor.se  <br>marketplace.haldor.se | Used by Microsoft Application Insights to register a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website. | 1 year | HTTP Cookie |

### Marketing

Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across the websites. These cookies are often third-party cookies. These cookies use information regarding your use of Haldor’s websites and they are often combined with third parties’ own data to create profiles and help us market towards you and other users. Haldor uses cookies together with third parties to manage, optimize and create a better user experience and for marketing purposes.

| Name | Provider | Purpose | Expiry | Type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| bcookie | linkedin.com | Used by the social networking service, LinkedIn, for tracking the use of embedded services. | 2 years | HTTP Cookie |
| UserMatchHistory | linkedin.com | Used to track visitors on multiple websites, in order to present relevant advertisement based on the visitor’s preferences. | 30 days | HTTP Cookie |
| lidc | .linkedin.com | Used by the social networking service, LinkedIn, for tracking the use of embedded services. | 24 hours | HTTP Cookie |
| lissc | .linkedin.com | Used by the social networking service, LinkedIn, for tracking the use of embedded services. | 365 days | HTTP Cookie |
| fr  | .facebook.com | Encrypted Facebook ID and Browser ID. Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers. | 3 months | HTTP Cookie |
| \_fbp | .haldor.se | Identifies browsers for the purposes of providing advertising and site analytics services. | 3 months | HTTP Cookie |
| hubspotuk | .haldor.se | This cookie keeps track of a visitor’s identity. It is passed to HubSpot on form submission and used when deduplicating contacts. | 13 months | HTTP Cookie |
| \_hstc | .haldor.se | It contains the domain, utk, initial timestamp (first visit), last timestamp (last visit), current timestamp (this visit), and session number (increments for each subsequent session). | 13 months | HTTP Cookie |
| \_hssrc | .haldor.se | Whenever HubSpot changes the session cookie, this cookie is also set to determine if the visitor has restarted their browser. | Session | HTTP Cookie |
